title: Energy Medicine.
cleaned_text: Issue 5, p651-658. 8p. Author(s): Gulmen, Funda M. Abstract: Energy medicine is becoming more frequently used in supporting patients to attain optimal health. The concept of energy medicine as a holistic practice is introduced and its relationship to physical medicine is discussed. In addition, descriptions of energy systems and modalities that are commonly used are also offered.
